item.title: How can my friend play mine through hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

He doesnt need hamachi if your using xp … Just create an account at www.dyndns.org
And make a hostname
and then run your server in your source
and he can play if he enters your ip in mopar

item.source: How can my friend play mine through hamachi?

item.title: How can my friend play mine through hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Ok download hamachi at www.hamachi.cc then once you’ve downloaded it then you open it then you see the power button click it. Then click the triangle then click create. Then put server name then server password. Make your friends download hamachi. Then once they’ve downloaded hamachi tell them to click the triangle and click join then tell them your servers username and password and boom. Then tell them to type your ip.

Read full topic

item.title: How can my friend play mine through hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Make sure you both have hamachi and make your friend join your network
Your friend should beable to join using your ip address
shown at the top of your hamachi.
He must have joined your network first.
